content.question: Which of the following is an example of a violation of antitrust laws?

choices.label: Advertising to increase a firmâ€™s market share in an industry
Making positive economic profits by charging a price above marginal cost
Making free-trade agreements with other countries
Engaging in collusive behavior to restrain competition
Charging a price below the price ceiling

content.answer: Engaging in collusive behavior to restrain competition

unit.text: 6: Market Failure and the Role of Government

topic.text: 6.4: The Effects of Government Intervention in Different Market Structures

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Identify an economic concept, principle, or model illustrated by an example.
